publicationStmt.p: This is an XML-TEI markup of the original publications by SIL Mexiko for the purposes of: archival and for the creation of a body of Mixtepec-Mixtec language resources (LR) (ISO: mix). Encoded documents used with the permission of original authors.

sourceDesc.bibl: Kue numero mancha iin sientu Beckmann, Gisela(consultant); Nieves, María M.(consultant); 2008. (2nd ed.).Tlalpan, D.F., Méxiko:Instituto Lingüístico de Verano, A.C. Obtained from:

textDesc.channel: @mode:'w' means that the primary means of utilising this document is by reading it's written form;
textDesc.derivation: this document is labeled "original" because the XML-TEI markup of it's contents have not made any alterations to the original content;

encodingDesc.ab: Maybe futer levenls of annotation can use linkGrp to define sense relation between the Mixtec lexical items for numbers and the digital number values they correspond to.

normalization.ab: 2018-04-07Spelling of lexical items which in the old orthography were homographs and which have been changed according to updated orthographic principles as per ../Mille/GUIA_ORTOGRAFICA_PRELIMINAR_Short_version.xml. In this document in particular, all instances in which the wors "one" is a component (originally spelled "iin") have been updated to "in" and the original forms are recorded in the value of the attribute orig.

spanGrp.span: Count then write how many animals and people there are on this page.
Cuenta y escribe cuantos animales y gente hay en este page.
